name: Space Geometry Challenge
description:
Game I made while working with Exeplay Games.

I am very proud on this project because I was given the opportunity to make it from my own idea I've presented to Exeplay Games back in 2020, so it was initially my way to prove my-self, and I delivered it in 3 months. Obviously, I reflect on it after all these years knowing that I could make it so much better at this time, learning about all these new ways to create, and optimize game performances and design patterns, but I will always cherish it.
